thread.title: Miami-Dade County Superintendent Named Chancellor of New York City Schools

author: Arian Campo-Flores
title: Miami-Dade County Superintendent Named Chancellor of New York City Schools

locations.name: new york city schools new york city

text:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio named Miami-Dade County Public Schools superintendent Alberto Carvalho as the next head of the country’s largest school system, going for a leader with a record of expanding school choices and improving student achievement.
The appointment of Mr. Carvalho ends a lengthy search for a schools chancellor by the de Blasio administration, which announced in December that Carmen Fariña would step down.
...
